availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George A. Utley (Hopkins County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Brown County, Ohio, native. Married to Mary E. Martin Utley in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on July 14, 1853. Father of William O. Utley, Alexander M. Utley, John B. Utley, B. A. Utley, Dorothy A. Utley, and Fanny Utley. Resident of Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 58B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 701.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Fisher Spring, p. 129A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages.
"George Andrew Utley (1827-1918)," Find A Grave, Memorial #65116176, accessed October 28, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/65116176.
